title: Warhammer.40.000.Space.Marine.Collection-PROPHET
description:
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine Collection (c) SEGA
release date: August 2769
protection: Steam + CEG
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/NL/CZ

In Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine you are Captain
Titus, a Space Marine of the Ultramarines chapter
and a seasoned veteran of countless battles. A
millions-strong Ork horde has invaded an Imperial
Forge World, one of the planet-sized factories
where the war machines for humanity's never ending
battle for survival are created. Losing this planet
is not an option and be aware of the far more evil
threat lurking large in the shadows of this world

The official Collection includes:

* Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine (main game)
* Power Sword DLC
* Golden Relic Bolter DLC
* Golden Relic Chainsword DLC
* Traitor Legions Pack DLC
* Emperor's Elite Pack DLC
* Blood Angels Veteran Armour Set DLC
* Alpha Legion Champion Armour Set DLC
* Legion of the Damned Armour Set DLC
* Salamanders Veteran Armour Set DLC
* Chaos Unleashed Map Pack DLC
* Dreadnought DLC
* Iron Hands Chapter Pack DLC
* Death Guard Champion Chapter Pack DLC

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
The game is updated to v1.0.165
